name: Swapply
description:
A simple one button game originally made for Ludum Dare 51. 

The character always move forward and will jump if you press X or another key on the keyboard, click the mouse or touch your screen.

Every 10 seconds, the game switches the control of the character.

There are 4 levels to complete. The game save your progress after each level.

There is kind of a special twist at the end :-)

Do not hesitate to provide me with feedbacks as the level design is still a bit buggy / tricky.

Thank you for playing!
